com.unitedcaterers

Interface UCServerFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIUCServerImpl

    public interface UCServerFactory
extends java.rmi.Remote

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UCServer getClientProxy()
      Note that the return type here is UCServer and not ClientProxy (even though as you may have observed, RMIUCServerFactoryImpl actually creates ClientProxy object.

    • Method Detail

      • getClientProxy

        UCServer getClientProxy()
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                               UCException
        Note that the return type here is UCServer and not ClientProxy (even though as you may have observed, RMIUCServerFactoryImpl actually creates ClientProxy object. The reason is that ClientProxy is a server side implementation detail, which the client doesn't care about. Client only cares about UCServer (or Database if you are exposing the lower level functionality on client side).
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        UCException
